metadata.name: Supreme Court Standard Legal Notice
metadata.description: Legal notice template following Supreme Court formatting standards. Used for pre-litigation notices in matters that may escalate to the Supreme Court.

required_fields.label: Sender Name
required_fields.description: Full legal name of the person or entity sending the notice

required_fields.label: Sender Address
required_fields.description: Complete postal address of the sender for service of reply
required_fields.example: 101, Corporate Tower, Connaught Place, New Delhi - 110001

required_fields.label: Recipient Name
required_fields.description: Full legal name of the person or entity receiving the notice

required_fields.label: Recipient Address
required_fields.description: Complete postal address for service of the notice

required_fields.label: Subject Matter
required_fields.description: Brief description of the matter for which notice is being sent
required_fields.example: Breach of Contract and Recovery of Dues

required_fields.label: Demand Details
required_fields.description: Specific demands, claims, or reliefs sought from the recipient
required_fields.example: Payment of Rs. 50,00,000/- with interest @ 18% p.a. from 01.01.2024

required_fields.label: Compliance Period
required_fields.description: Time period within which the recipient must comply or respond
required_fields.example: 15 days from receipt of this notice

optional_fields.label: Prior Correspondence
optional_fields.description: Reference to any earlier communications between parties

optional_fields.label: Supporting Documents
optional_fields.description: List of documents attached or referred to in the notice
optional_fields.example: Copy of Agreement dated 01.06.2023, Invoices, Bank Statements
